Note.Content: MT עַל־מוּת HOTTP-C NIV "to the end" | RSV NRSV ESV "forever" NJPS "evermore" REB "for evermore" GNT "for all time to come" GNT "always" = {L:עֹלמות<SDBH:עֹולָם>}
TS תמות NJPS "you never die" NRSV "you shall not die" GNT CEV "you are eternal" | MT RSV "we shall not die" NIV "we will not die" REB "who is immortal?"
GNT "he suffered a stroke" | RSV NRSV RSV "his heart died" NIV "his heart failed" CEV "he had a heart attack" | NJPS "his courage died" | REB "he had a seizure"

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
literally: (one's) heart dies; hence, possibly: = process by which humans suffer from a brain hemorrhage
